downloadTitle: OnPremise SQL Server to Azure VM
downloadDescription: Migrating OnPremise SQL Server to Azure VM using Backup and Restore

downloadFile.name: OnPremise SQL Server to Azure VM.pdf

detailsSection:
This document outlines steps requited to automate the backup & restore on-premise databases to Azure 
SQL VM by using custom t-sql scripts. The process outlined here is semi-automated but it provides flexibility 
consolidate on a larger VM or migrate source databases across multiple VMs.
detailsSection_file_name: OnPremise SQL Server to Azure VM.pdf
